name: Programming Language Classification from Source Code [Kaggle Kernels]
desc:
Multi Class vs Multi Label - We need multi-class clf, not mulit-label !!

Source : 
[1] https://github.com/susanli2016/NLP-with-Python/blob/master/Multi-Class%20Text%20Classification%20LSTM%20Consumer%20complaints.ipynb
[2] https://towardsdatascience.com/multi-class-text-classification-with-lstm-1590bee1bd17

Similar to Andrej Karpathy's unreasonable effectiveness of RNNs : http://karpathy.github.io/2015/05/21/rnn-effectiveness/

Can compare or cluster languages based on their syntax

name: Contribute to popular open source projects like fast.ai
SIIM-ISIC Melanoma Classification [Kaggle]
desc:
Started the competition as part of Udacity ML Engg Nanodegree Capstone Project

Competition link - https://www.kaggle.com/c/siim-isic-melanoma-classification

Github repo link - https://github.com/pritesh-shrivastava/melanoma-classification

Ended up with a rank of top 18% (~600) out of 3400 teams !! 
Could have gotten a lucky bronze if we selected a low scoring public kernel for final submission !!

name: Programming Languages - Part A by U Wash [Coursera]
